record.title: AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 3773, RESTORE ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 3773, RESTORE ACT OF 2007 -- (House of Representatives - November 15, 2007)

[Page: H14063]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that, in the engrossment of the bill, H.R. 3773, the Clerk be authorized to correct section numbers, cross-references, punctuation, and indentation, and to make other technical and conforming changes as necessary to reflect the actions of the House.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Michigan?
